title: Apply for a Homestead Exemption
description: A new homeowner wants to apply for a homestead exemption to reduce their property taxes.

tasks.description: Gather the homeowner's information and property details.
Verify that the homeowner meets the eligibility criteria (e.g., it is their primary residence).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the homeowner is eligible for the exemption.

tasks.description: Process the application for the homestead exemption.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies the exemption to the property record, which will lower future tax bills.
